title: Studio Hands
short: An inspirational website by Studio Hands, a Netherlands-based design studio.
body: Studio Hands are a Netherlands-based design studio. Their portfolio website is highly interactive, featuring full screen video on hover, strong use of typography, smart use of color, subtle page transitions and horizontal image galleries of client projects. Be sure to check [them out](https://www.studiohands.nl/)! Example client page... ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020) * [Inspirational Freelance Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-13-inspirational-freelance-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
